channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lampost Light is not working, 13th November
item.description:
The lampost in the alley way in upper wickham lane between the chinese herbilist and the elenor charity shop is not working .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Upper Wickham Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Lots of rubbish just lying around the street, 13th November

item.title: Leaves from trees not being swept., 13th November
item.description:
Leaves have not been swept for months now. When stepping up or down from the pavement you cannot see where the pavement is with the amount of leaves. Also when wet it would be slippery.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranworth Gardens, Oval, London

item.description:

item.title: Blocked waste chute, 13th November
item.description:
The waste chute on the first floor of Danby house by Flats 3/4, is blocked and has now created a foul odour causing a health hazard. It has been blocked for roughly 6 months now and nobody has reported it. The foul smell is vomit inducing and nauseating.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Frampton Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox in the bushes on the corner of green dale astroturf., 13th November
item.description:
Dead fox to be disposed of. I've put an error on the photo of where it is, but you can also quite clearly see it from the path. happy to come down and show you where it is if needed - 07801897130.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burrow Road, East Dulwich, London

item.title: Heavy leak from roof pipe, 13th November
item.description:

item.title: End of Larch Grove between 13 - 15, 13th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Larch Grove, Blackfen, Sidcup, London

item.description:
